Posts.Content: Sorry about your news. You have come to the right place i know every lady is there to tell you everything you need to know.I am here to be a friend and can give you a mans point of veiw, if you every want to talk me and all the ladys are here. good luck with your treatment                                                                                       Paul xx
Posts.Title: first day

Posts.Content: Hi its Paul              I have tryed to send you a private message to thank you for your support. I have read your letter on your cancer. You are amazzing and you have a heart of gold. After all the things that you have gone thro and what you are now going thro, You still have time to reply to me with advice.I have taken what you have told me on board. i do feel a lot better but still scared about next week. i only wish i could help you in any way. I would. But will be here if you need a friend anytime nite or day. i hope if i get bad news next week i can be as strong as you.                                                          best wishers Paul xx
Posts.Title: My story and some advice please

Posts.Content: Why are you coming across to me as the weak wife under the thumb. Yes i am a man and i care for the people around me, But some how they dont see what i go through beind sick with side efects of the loads of drugs i take every day. But i keep that and everything else to myself.I am going for my mammagram next week on my own. i have told some of my family and friends about it but not one of them have said anything about it since i told them. You are stronger than you give urself credit for. We do not live in the 1800s..I am sorry but you do have to find some way to get them all to hear you. You have to start thinking of your self. When they want somthing like your daughter wanting to go shoping Tell them no let them be grumpy. I know its easy to say and you have to put up with there selfish ways and there ungreatful moaning please just try. There is help out there for you just ring the numbers others have sent to you.I really wish i could help you more. But i am here for you just like everybody on this site                                                   big hugs Paul x
Posts.Title: Zoladex and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Good morning ladys                                Today here at last. its been 2 weeks since i seen my GP with a lump behind my nipple. Today i find out what it is i hope..I have my mammagram today I have only got to this point because of you ladys and this site otherwise i would of ran the other way. You have all become like a family to me you have always been there when i needeed advice or a rant. My own family dont care they know because i have told my sister about today. that was 2 weeks ago, so i guess that they didnt what to know. i felt alone. Till i joined this site. I now have 100s of crazy sisters who i know will br there for me, You have all been great.But one lady have been the big sister she has been there every day sending me pm just helping me day by day She deseaves a special thank you, her name is Black panther. i think it shoud be Black moggy, She is going throrght her own hell like everybody on here. But has taken time to help me through this day by day,                                 A BIG THANK U ANG BIG HUG ALL AROUND  Paul xxxx
Posts.Title: thank yuo to evertone

Posts.Content: hi  Its realy sounds like you going thro hell at that moment. What you have done in the last 7 years has been so amazng. It sounds like you have put your family first all through that 7 years. Now its time you have got to put your self first. I just think your hubby and kids have been so use to haveing this strong wife and mum looking after them.They have failed to notice your pain. its for you to think of your self.Tell hubby how bad  you feel and what your going through i am sure he will releise how much  he and the kids have taken you for granted. Thinking your some kind of superwoman.They hopefully will let you get the rest you need and give you some well deseaved TLC. I do hope you get a break somewere and you get to chill out in the sun. Like all the ladys on the site i will alway be here if you need a friend.                          BEST WISHERS pAUL XX
Posts.Title: Zoladex and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: I am a 53 yo male waiting to go for a mammagram. I found a lump behind my nipple at the weekend Iwent to see the dr on monday After checking it she has told me its fifty fifty that i could have breast cancer. My mum had it 2 years ago and so have some of my aunts so it is the geans There is notmuch info for men with breast cancer. I have looked at the site that macmillan but that is little compaired to the sites for woman. i no i dont know if i have it or not. but i think anybody waiting for that test man or women is scared. I am, can anybody offer any advise
Posts.Title: breast cancer in men

Posts.Content: Thanks for replying I think the next 2 weeks are going to seam like a lifetime
Posts.Title: breast cancer in men

Posts.Content: Hi Tony           I am like you i found a lump onthe right hand side under my nipple. It isnt painfull but does leak some clear fluid sometimes. There is not much i can tell you but you have come to the right site for advice.i go for a mommagram next monday I have now been waiting a week up top now. I know how you feel and it is scareyand very hard to think of anything else. . Tony i know is hard to do but you have got to keep your self busy try keep your mind working on something else. do you have any support there with you.                                               best wishers Paul
Posts.Title: breast cancer in men

Posts.Content: Hi Black panther                        Thank you for your reply. I must say i have had more support from the ladys on this site than i would get from my  family.Not easy to say but my family wont be intrested in what happens to me. There is no way they would make any efford to go with me, I have been ill with kidney failere 4 4 years I have been in hospatallots of times with infections and even had a brain hammeridge 2 years ago.I was blind for a few weeks.In all that time spent in hospatal ill or having treatment i have not seen 1 member of my family. The only person i seen was my then girlfreind she supported me for almost 3 years before we split up..The support i get from this site will get me through it thats all i need thank you to everybody                                                                     Best wishers Paul
Posts.Title: breast cancer in men

Posts.Content: Hi Mistymoley                      Took a few days to think about your reply to me. I think its wrong for your to judge breast cancer in men isnt as devastating as it is for women, Breast cancer in men and women is breast cancer. Men will be treated the same way as women are. The same opps same drugs and all other treatments. I am scared about going for a mammagram next monday.But i have to go. I can only guess that every woman that finds a lump like i did gos through the same feelings as i am. This site has been the only support i have. Some replys have been supportive and have helped me with information.i have 1 more week to go.thats 1 week of sleepless nights 1 week of days with in on my mind.i still have to get on with life, eat drink do everyday things. plus i have to go to dialysis 3 times a week. I watched my mum go through breast cancer.I havent even told my family about my test next week,Nobody knows.Igo for my tests alone with only the support of you ladys on this site. But if i do have breast cancer i expect to be treated the same way as anybody with breast cancer and i no it wont be easier for me                                                                             paul
Posts.Title: breast cancer in men

Posts.Content: Hi ladys Paul is back to see how everyone is. When on holiday after i was given the all clear. Those two weeks were some of the worse time of my life waiting for them tests. I found going for them very scarey just going into the centre was bad being the only guy there made it worse. i got throuht it with your help and somebody being there for me helped so much.I still have some major healh problems like i need a transplant next is scan on my stumach to investergate a lump inside  then carmrea into my lungs they fill with fluid and need to be drained at times. I wouldnt pass a mot. i know i dont know what any of you ladys are going through but i understand everybody needs a friend. I am and will be here for any of you day or night just a chat or anything I will b a big brother to you all                         best wishs  Paul xx
Posts.Title: still here for anyone
